channel.title: Profiles on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Profiles on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - Filter
item.description: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - Filter Steps Step Description Expected result go to ‘Advanced parameters > Team > Profiles’ page title contains ‘Profiles’ reset filter Total of profiles after reset = Total of profiles Filter by id_profile value 4" Number of profiles < Total of profiles all rows column ‘id_profile’ contains ‘4’ reset filter Total of profiles after reset = Total of profiles Filter by name

item.title: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - CRUD
item.description: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - CRUD Steps Step Description Expected result go to ‘Advanced parameters > Team > Profiles’ page title contains ‘Profiles’ reset filter Total of profiles > 0 go to add new profile title contains ‘Add new’ create profile Criteria : name: faker.name.jobType() from faker Successful message is displayed Number of profiles = Total of profiles + 1 Filter list by new name Number of profiles < Total of profiles + 1

item.title: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - pagination and Bulk Actions
item.description: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - pagination and Bulk Actions Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Advanced parameters > Team > Profiles Profile page is displayed Create 10 roles Successful creation alert is displayed Number of profiles = Total of profiles + 10 Change the items number to 10 per page The number of pages should be displayed (page 1 / 2) Click on next The page number should be displayed (page 2 / 2) Click on previous Page number should be displayed

item.title: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - Sort
item.description: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Roles - Sort Steps Step Description Expected result go to ‘Advanced parameters > Team > Profiles’ page title contains ‘Profiles’ profiles list is well displayed Reset all filters All filters are reset , the profiles are displayed Sort by ID asc profiles list are sorted by ID (1-> 2 ->3 …) Sort by ID desc profiles list are sorted by ID (3-> 2 ->1…) Sort by name asc profiles list are sorted by name (a-> b ->c …) Sort by name desc profiles list are sorted by name (c-> b ->a…)

item.title: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Profiles - Help card
item.description: BO - Advanced parameters - Team - Profiles - Help card Steps Step Description Expected result BO > Advanced Parameters > Team > Profiles Profiles page is well displayed Click on Help button in top right corner Help card is displayed from the right side of the page Case1 Click on {color:#4c9aff}x{color} button in the Help card header Case 2
